text: No, I don't think so. There's an ongoing effort to change the backend and organization of the documentation (currently it's a mix of docs for specific packages such as AdvancedHMC and MCMCChains) and some Turing.jl-specific things, but unfortunately currently some parts are a bit outdated and due to coming reorganization not too much effort is put into updating the old setup.
